title: Zhu Zhu Xia Zhi Zhongji Juezhan Qianye Pian
original_name: 猪猪侠之终极决战前夜篇
sinopse: The fairy tale world ushered in a new era of peaceful coexistence between monsters and humans. But after entering the dark gate, Barrow, the initiator of the last round of crisis, was activated by the mysterious bloodline hidden in his body. The memory of the ancient genes drove Barrow to lead the ancient monsters to avenge the humans. Barrow completely solved the seal of the three monsters that escaped from the cracks in the dark gate in the last round of fierce battle. Their abilities were awakened. Began to wreak havoc on the city. Piggy-Man was shocked and learned that his father Barrow turned out to be the leader of the monster, so he decided to find his father and let him correct his evil. In front of his father who had gone astray, Pigman didn't choose to help him be abusive, but decided to call his father's heart with family affection, and finally eliminated the imminent crisis again.(translated from douban)
